kpi: Percentage of vuln cases with tailored plans
sql_query: SELECT (COUNT(CASE WHEN plan_type = 'tailored' THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)) AS percent FROM vuln_cases WHERE date >= '2025-01-01'

kpi: Average resolution time for vuln escalations
sql_query: SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(hour, created_at, resolved_at)) AS avg_hours FROM vuln_cases WHERE escalated = 1
SELECT AVG(satisfaction_score) AS avg_score FROM vuln_feedback WHERE date >= '2025-01-01'
